Constructor Detail

ExchangeInitiator

public ExchangeInitiator()

Method Detail

randomExchange

public void randomExchange()
First advertises to rendezvousPeers and send them local peer information e.g. Peer object, Ontologies (limited to resourceLocator, URI, name), Mappings (limited to URI, name), Domains. Second, updates the local peer with the list of the rendezvous known peers It retrieves the peer information of every known peer and add it or update it locally e.g. Peer object, Ontologies (limited to resourceLocator, URI, name), Mappings (limited to URI, name), Domains.

expertiseExchange

public void expertiseExchange()

exchange

public void exchange()
Contacts every known peer (i.e. remote peer). For each remote peer, updates the local peer with the list of the remote peer known peers. It retrieves the peer information of every known peer and add it or update it locally e.g. Peer object, Ontologies (limited to resourceLocator, URI, name), Mappings (limited to URI, name), Domains.

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Shutdown.

run

public void run()
Starts the Exchanger.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
